cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper discusses data-driven approaches to text summarization, which is a common topic in natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML) research. The use of scientific articles as a new milestone for text summarization suggests a focus on academic or technical writing, which is often found in the computational linguistics (cs.CL) and information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of neural network-based summarization approaches, which are commonly used in deep learning (cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL) research.
